service industry.

<JD_START>
Job Title: Retail Marketing Associate

Location: Queens, NY

Employment Type: full-time

Listed Skills: Customer Service, Marketing, Sales

Description:
Are you excited about the prospect of being a Retail Marketing Associate with First Class Marketing in Melville, NY? Join our team and take on a pivotal role in captivating customers, boosting brand visibility, and driving retail sales. This full-time position offers a dynamic work environment, comprehensive training, and abundant opportunities for professional growth.
Responsibilities:As a Retail Marketing Associate, your day-to-day duties will involve:Engaging customers in retail environments to bolster brand recognition and stimulate sales.Leveraging sales scripts and product expertise to effectively convey key messages and features.Assisting customers with inquiries, offering product details, and guiding them through the purchasing process.Conducting product demonstrations and presentations to highlight the value of our offerings.Collaborating with the sales team to surpass sales targets and revenue objectives.Maintaining a tidy and well-organized sales environment to elevate the customer experience.Collecting customer feedback and communicating it to relevant teams for continual enhancement.
Additional Responsibilities:Participating in sales training sessions to augment product knowledge and sales techniques.Analyzing sales data and market trends to identify avenues for growth and optimization.Contributing to the creation of marketing materials and promotional strategies to enhance brand visibility.Assisting in organizing special events, product launches, and other brand awareness initiatives.Providing exceptional customer service to cultivate enduring relationships with clients.
Qualifications:Prior experience in sales, customer service, or retail is advantageous but not obligatory.Strong interpersonal and communication skills, with the ability to engage and connect with customers.Eagerness to acquire and master sales techniques and product knowledge.Capacity to thrive in a fast-paced environment and effectively manage multiple tasks.High school diploma or equivalent required; additional education in business or marketing is a plus.
Benefits:Competitive compensation package with potential for performance-based bonuses and incentives.Comprehensive training program aimed at honing sales skills and product knowledge.Vibrant work environment offering avenues for growth and advancement.Exciting perks, including team-building activities, networking opportunities, and community involvement initiatives.All major holidays off to cherish moments with family and loved ones.
Work Environment:Balancing time between retail settings for customer engagement and the office for sales training sessions.Weekly compensation paid hourly plus commission, providing limitless earning potential.
Equal Employment Opportunity:First Class Marketing is dedicated to offering equal employment opportunities to all qualified individuals, irrespective of race, color, religion, sex, sexual orientation, gender identity, national origin, age, disability, or veteran status.

Experience Level (if available): Entry level
<JD_END>
